Detailed Description

PMIP Processing for LMA

Function Documentation

msg_info_t *  info,
int  propagate 
)

Deregister a binding cache entry.

Parameters:
[in] bce A binding cache entry
[in] info Informations contained in the message received
[in] propagate Deregistration to MAG
Returns:
the number of binding cache entries in the cache.
int lma_reg ( pmip_entry_t *  bce  ) 

Register a binding cache entry, then create a tunnel between LMA and MAG (LMA->MAG) for this mobile node and add a route for peer address.

Parameters:
[in] bce A binding cache entry
Returns:
Zero if bce is not NULL, else -1
